GTSConfig.Welcome:
Welcome to the ${Config.ServiceProviderName} Configuration Assistant


This application will help you through the process of setting the most common configuration items.
Please step through each of the configuration screens entering the requested information.
If necessary, you may click "Back" to go back to a previous screen.
Please click the 'Next' button below when you are ready to proceed.

PropertyItem.Description: Please Enter your ${Config.ServiceProviderName} Service Account ID:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the Service Account ID provided by ${Config.ServiceProviderName}
PropertyItem.Help:
(This is the ID provided by ${Config.ServiceProviderName}. If you have not been provided a Service Account ID,
then enter the value "gts" into this fiels, or contact ${Config.ServiceProviderName} for the correct Service Account ID.)

PropertyItem.Description: Please Enter your ${Config.ServiceProviderName} Service Account Name:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the name used to describe your organization
PropertyItem.Help: (Enter the name used to describe your organization.)

PropertyItem.Description: Enter the Gateway Appliance IP Address: (ie. "${Config.HostAddress}")
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the IP address of this gateway host
PropertyItem.Help: (This is the IP address of this host)

PropertyItem.Description: [Optional] Enter the Gateway Appliance domain name: (ie. "${Config.HostName}")
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the domain name of this gateway host
PropertyItem.Help: (This is the domain name of this host)

PropertyItem.Description: [Optional] Enter the local host service 'bind' address (blank to bind to all local addresses): (ie. "${Config.HostAddress}" or "${Config.HostName}")
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the local host name or IP address to which the device communication servers should be 'bound'
PropertyItem.Help:
(This is the host name or IP address to which local device services are 'bound'. This will be
the IP address from which server communication to the device will originate.)

PropertyItem.Description: Select the Preferred Database Provider:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select a Database Provider
PropertyItem.Help: (This is the preferred database provider used to store persistent account/device/etc information.)

PropertyItem.Description: Enter the Database Provider host name:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the Database Provider host name
PropertyItem.Help: (This is the host name used to access the specified Database Provider)

PropertyItem.Description: Enter the Database Provider access port:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the Database Provider access port
PropertyItem.Help:
(This is the port used to access the specified Database Provider.
MySQL default port is '3306', MAMP/WAMP/LAMP typically uses port '8889')

PropertyItem.Description: Select the Preferred DB Connection Pooling Mode:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select a Preferred DB Connection Pooling Mode
PropertyItem.Help: (This is the preferred database connection pooling mode.)

PropertyItem.Description: Select the Preferred Map Provider:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select the preferred MapProvider
PropertyItem.Help:
(Select the preferred Map Provider. Note that some map providers may require a valid authorization key
that you must obtain from the map provider vendor.)

PropertyItem.Description: Enter the Map Provider Authorization Key (if required):
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the MapProvider authorization key (if required)
PropertyItem.Help:
(Enter the authorization key required by the specific Map Provider vendor. OpenLayers does not
require an authorization key).

PropertyItem.Description: Select the Preferred Reverse-Geocode Provider:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select the preferred ReverseGeocodeProvider
PropertyItem.Help:
(Select the preferred Reverse-Geocode Provider. The Reverse-Geocode service is what converts a Latitude/Longitude
into an Address that can be displayed on a report. Note that some reverse-geocode providers may require
a valid authorization key that you must obtain from the reverse-geocode provider vendor.)

PropertyItem.Description: Enter the Reverse-Geocode Authorization Key (if required):
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the ReverseGeocodeProvider authorization key (if required)
PropertyItem.Help:
(Enter the authorization key required by the specific Reverse-Geocode Provider vendor.
Geonames 'free' service does not require an authorization key.)

PropertyItem.Description: Select the Preferred Geocode Provider:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select the preferred GeocodeProvider
PropertyItem.Help:
(Select the preferred Geocode Provider. The Geocode service is what converts an Address into a
Latitude/Longitude that can be displayed on a map. Note that some geocode providers may require
a valid authorization key that you must obtain from the geocode provider vendor.)

PropertyItem.Description: Enter the Geocode Authorization Key (if required):
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the GeocodeProvider authorization key (if required)
PropertyItem.Help:
(Enter the authorization key required by the specific Geocode Provider vendor.
Geonames 'free' service does not require an authorization key.)

PropertyItem.Description: Check if 'Center on Address/ZipCode' is to be enabled on the Geozone Admin page:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to enable 'Center on Address/ZipCode' on Geozone Admin
PropertyItem.Help:
(This value indicates whether the 'Center on Address/ZipCode' field should be enabled on the
Geozone Admin page.)

PropertyItem.Description: Enter your SMTP email server hostname:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the SMTP server name used to send email
PropertyItem.Help:
(This is the SMTP server name used to send outbound email. Unless explicitly configured to be an email relay,
"localhost" is likely not the proper server. This value should be obtained from your email system administrator.)

PropertyItem.Description: Enter your SMTP email server port:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the SMTP server port used to send email
PropertyItem.Help:
(This is the SMTP server port used to send outbound email through the above SMTP server. This value should
be obtained from your email system administrator.)

PropertyItem.Description: Check if SSL is required to send EMail from this SMTP server:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box if SSL is require for this SMTP server
PropertyItem.Help:
(This value indicates whether outbound SMTP connections should be encrypted via SSL. This box should only
be check if required to do so by your email system administrator.)

PropertyItem.Description: Enter the authorized SMTP username (if required):
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the authorized SMTP username
PropertyItem.Help:
(This is the username used for authorization/authentication on the specified SMTP server. This value
should be obtained from your email system administrator.)

PropertyItem.Description: Enter the authorized SMTP user password (if required):
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the authorized SMTP user password
PropertyItem.Help:
(This is the user password used for authorization/authentication on the specified SMTP server. This value
should be obtained from your email system administrator.)

PropertyItem.Description: Enter the Notification 'From" EMail Address:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the email address used for sending notifications
PropertyItem.Help:
(This is the email address indicated in the "From" field of an email. Some SMTP/EMail service providers will
require a specific email address for this purpose. This value should be obtained from your email system
administrator.)

PropertyItem.Description: Select the Preferred Language (displayed on the web pages):
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select the language locale
PropertyItem.Help: (This is the preferred language in which the text will be displayed on your web-interface.)

PropertyItem.Description: Enter the Preferred WebPage Header Title:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the title to display at the top of the log-in web pages
PropertyItem.Help: (This is the web-interface "Title" which will be displayed in the web-interface login banner.)

PropertyItem.Description: Enter the Preferred WebPage Copyright Footer:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the text to display at the bottom of the log-in web pages
PropertyItem.Help: (This is the web-interface "Copyright" displayed at the bottom web-interface pages.)

PropertyItem.Description: Check this box to display the login "Account" field:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to display the login "Account" field
PropertyItem.Help: (If checked, the "Account" login field will be displayed on the login page.)

PropertyItem.Description: Check this box to display the login "User" field:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to display the login "User" field
PropertyItem.Help: (If checked, the "User" login field will be displayed on the login page.)

PropertyItem.Description: Check this box to display the login "EMail" field:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to display the login "EMail" field
PropertyItem.Help: (If checked, the "EMail" login field will be displayed on the login page.)

PropertyItem.Description: Check to display a pull-down of the available language translations on the login page:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to display a pull-down of the available language translations on the login page
PropertyItem.Help: (This value indicates whether the language translations section pulldown menu will be displayed)

PropertyItem.Description: Check this box to enable the 'Demo' Account login:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this button to enable the 'demo' account
PropertyItem.Help: (If checked, the "Demo" button will be available on the login page.)

PropertyItem.Description: Select the Preferred Main Menu Type:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select the preferred main menu type
PropertyItem.Help: (Select the preferred main menu type.)

PropertyItem.Description: Select the Preferred Date Format:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select the preferred data format
PropertyItem.Help: (Select the preferred data format displayed on reports.)

PropertyItem.Description: Select the Preferred Date Format:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select the preferred time format
PropertyItem.Help: (Select the preferred time format displayed on reports.)

PropertyItem.Description: Select the Preferred Calendar First-Day-Of-Week:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select the preferred calendar first-day-of-the-week
PropertyItem.Help:
(Select the map/report calendar first day of week. US territories use Sunday as the first day of the week.
European teriitories typically use Monday as the first day of the week.)

PropertyItem.Description: Select the Login Look-and-Feel Layout:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select the login look-and-feel layout
PropertyItem.Help: (Select the desire Login Look-and-Feel layout)

PropertyItem.Description: Web-page Background Color:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Choose the desired background color for the web-page look and feel
PropertyItem.Help: (Choose the desired background color for the web-page look and feel)

PropertyItem.Description: Device (Vehicle) Admin:
Allow Account to create new devices:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select the Device Creation authorization for the Device Admin page.
PropertyItem.Help: (Select the desired device creation authentication)

PropertyItem.Description: Check to show the "SMS" command selection button:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to display the "SMS" command selection button on the Device Admin list page.
PropertyItem.Help: (This value indicates whether the "SMS" command selection button will be displayed on the Device Admin list page)

PropertyItem.Description: Check to show the "Notes" field on the edit page:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to display the "Notes" field on the Device Admin edit page.
PropertyItem.Help: (This value indicates whether the "Notes" field will be displayed on the Device Admin edit page)

PropertyItem.Description: Select the Map Controls Location:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select whether to display the map controls to the left or right of the map
PropertyItem.Help:
(This controls which side of the map the map-controls will be displayed. Select "left" to show the map
controls on the left, and "right" to show the map controls on the right.)

PropertyItem.Description: Select the Preferred Calendar Display Option on Device Map Page:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select the preferred calendar display option
PropertyItem.Help:
(Select the calendar display option. "Fixed" will show 2 full From/To calendars. "Fade/Scroll" will allow
scrolling one calendar on top of another. "PopUp" will show only the From/To calendar header and clicking
on the header will cause the selected calendar to display.)

PropertyItem.Description: Check to display TimeZone section pulldown menu on on Track Map pages:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to display the TimeZone section pulldown menu on the Device/Fleet map page
PropertyItem.Help: (This value indicates whether the TimeZone section pulldown menu will be displayed)

PropertyItem.Description: Check to display Cursor Latitude/Logitude location on the map:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to display the Cursor Latitude/Logitude location
PropertyItem.Help:
(This value indicates whether the Cursor Latitude/Longitude location should be displayed in
the map control area)

PropertyItem.Description: Check to display the Pushpin legend on the map:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to display the Pushpin legend
PropertyItem.Help: (This value indicates whether the Pushpin Legend should be displayed in the map control area)

PropertyItem.Description: Select the Map Overflow Display Behavior:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select whether to display the first, or last, set of points when there are too many points to display at one time
PropertyItem.Help:
(In the case where their are more pushpin than can be displayed on a single map, select "Show first..." to
display the first set of events, omitting the remaining events from the display. Or select "Show last..."
to display the last, most recent, events, omitting the older events.)

PropertyItem.Description: Select the display order for the "Location Detail" list:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select the display order for the "Location Detail" list
PropertyItem.Help:
(Select "Ascending" to display events from oldest to newest.
Select "Descending to display events fron newest to oldest).

PropertyItem.Description: Check to display DeviceChooser pulldown menu on maps and report menu:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to display DeviceChooser pulldown menu on maps and report menu
PropertyItem.Help:
(This value indicates whether the DeviceChooser pull-down menu will be displayed
or a standard pull-down menu combo-box)

PropertyItem.Description: Check to display the 'Search' field in the DeviceChooser pulldown menu:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to display the 'Search' field in the DeviceChooser pulldown menu
PropertyItem.Help:
(This value indicates whether the 'Search' field should be displayed in the DeviceChooser
pull-down menu)

PropertyItem.Description: Check to enable "Auto Update" on map:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to enable "Auto Update".
PropertyItem.Help: (This value indicates whether the "Auto" button should be visible/enabled on the map)

PropertyItem.Description: "Auto Update" interval (in seconds):
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the auto-update interval, in seconds.
PropertyItem.Help: (This value specifies the auto-update interval, in seconds).

PropertyItem.Description: "Auto Update" Count:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the number of auto-updates to perform before it turns off
PropertyItem.Help:
(This value specifies the number of auto-updates that are to be performed before the auto-update
stops, requiring that the button be pressed again to start another auto-update sequence).

PropertyItem.Description: "Auto Update" map update zomm/recenter behavior:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select the desired zoom/recenter behavior when auto-updated the map
PropertyItem.Help:
(This selection specifies the zoom/center behavior when auto-updating the map at the specified
interval. Options are to leave the zoom/center as-is, zoome/center on the last pushpin, or
zoom/center so all pushpins are displayed).

PropertyItem.Description: Check to enable "Replay" on map:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to enable pushpin "Replay".
PropertyItem.Help: (This value indicates whether the "Replay" button should be visible/enabled on the map)

PropertyItem.Description: "Replay" interval (in milliseconds):
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the replay interval, in milliseconds.
PropertyItem.Help:
(This value specifies the replay interval, in 'milliseconds' if greater 30.
If the specified value is 30 or less, then the value will be interpreted as 'seconds').

PropertyItem.Description: Check to display a single pushpin only when replaying the track:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: CHeck this box to display a single pushpin only during replay.
PropertyItem.Help:
(This value indicates whether only a single pushpin should be displayed when replaying
the pushpin tracks).

PropertyItem.Description: Check to draw the "Route-Line" between adjacent Device pushpins:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to enable the pushpin "Route-Line".
PropertyItem.Help:
(This value indicates whether the "Route-Line" between adjacent Device pushpins
should be drawn on the map)

PropertyItem.Description: Check to set the Report Menu calendar date/time with last date/time selected on Track Map:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to use the date/time last menu on the on the Track Map page
PropertyItem.Help:
(This value indicates whether the Report calendar should be initialized with the last selected
date/time from the Track Map pages)

PropertyItem.Description: Check to display the TimeZone section pulldown on on Report Menu page:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to display the TimeZone section pulldown menu on the Report Menu page
PropertyItem.Help: (This value indicates whether the TimeZone section pulldown menu will be displayed)

PropertyItem.Description: Check to enable the "EMail Report" option on the Report Menu:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to enable the "EMail Report" option on the Report Menu
PropertyItem.Help:
(This value indicates whether the "EMail Report" option should be enabled and available in the
report output format selection pull-down on the Report Menu)

PropertyItem.Description: Enter a custom report output format URL:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter a custom report output format URL
PropertyItem.Help:
(If specified, this URL will be used to compose a custom report output option which will be
selectable on the report menu when generating a report. The report selection options will
be appended to this URL when the user selects the "Custom" report format)

PropertyItem.Description: Check the reports to be included:

PropertyItem.Label: Temperature Report (requires hardware which supports this feature)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include the Temperature report

PropertyItem.Label: PropertyValue Report (used for OpenDMTP compliant devices)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include the PropertyValue report

PropertyItem.Label: DiagnosticValue Report (used for OpenDMTP compliant devices)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include the DiagnosticValue report

PropertyItem.Label: J1708 FaultCode Report (requires hardware which supports this feature)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include the J1708 FaultCode report

PropertyItem.Label: Exceeding Posted Speed-Limit Report (requires Geonames/NavTeq reverse-geocode service)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include the Exceeding Posted Speed-Limit report

PropertyItem.Label: WayMark-1 Detail Report
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include the WayMark-1 detail report

PropertyItem.Label: Driver Message Detail Report
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include the Driver Message detail report

PropertyItem.Description: Check the columns that should be included on various reports:

PropertyItem.Label: Include the Latitude/Longitude columns
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include the Latitude/Longitude on selected reports

PropertyItem.Label: Include the Odometer column
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include the Odometer value on selected reports

PropertyItem.Label: Include Fuel Usage column (requires hardware which supports this feature)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include the Fuel Usage columns on selected reports

PropertyItem.Label: Include Fuel Economy column (requires hardware which supports this feature)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include the Fuel Economy columns on selected reports

PropertyItem.Label: Include a map-link on the "index" column of EventDetail reports.
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include a clickable link on the report index which will display the map with the selected information-balloon displayed.

PropertyItem.Description: Select the desired behavior when a future date/time is encountered on an incoming Event:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select the desired behavior for future date/time events
PropertyItem.Help: (The value determines how events will be handled that have event times in the future)

Selection.SelectionItem: Ignore the event with the future date
Set date/time to current time plus the maximum future time

PropertyItem.Description: Enter the maximum number of seconds allowed that a reported event time may be into the future:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the maximum number of seconds allowed that a reported event time may be into the future:
PropertyItem.Help:
(This value represents the maximum number of seconds that the reported time from an invoming
event may be into the future.)

PropertyItem.Description: Select the desired behavior when an invalid speed is encountered on an incoming Event:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Select the desired behavior for invalid speed events
PropertyItem.Help: (The value determines how events will be handled that have an invalid speed)

Selection.SelectionItem: Ignore the event with the invalid speed
Set speed to the maximum speed value

PropertyItem.Description: Enter the maximum allowed speed (in kilometers) that may be reported by an incoming event:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the maximum allowed speed (in kilometers) that may be reported by an incoming event:
PropertyItem.Help: (This value represents the maximum speed (in kilometers) that an event may report)

PropertyItem.Description: Enter the maximum allowed odometer value (in kilometers) that may be recorded:
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Enter the maximum allowed odometer value (in kilometers) that may be recorded:
PropertyItem.Help:
(This value is used to help filter out possible invalid odometer values that may be
reported by the remote GPS tracking/telematic device)

PropertyItem.Description: Additional 'Account' table fields:

PropertyItem.Label: 'AddressFieldInfo' Fields (additional address information)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional 'AddressFieldInfo' fields in the Account table

PropertyItem.Label: 'AccountManagerInfo' Fields (support for Account Managers)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional 'AccountManagerInfo' fields in the Account table

PropertyItem.Description: Additional 'User' table fields:

PropertyItem.Label: 'AddressFieldInfo' Fields (additional address information)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional 'AddressFieldInfo' fields in the User table

PropertyItem.Description: Additional 'Device' table fields:

PropertyItem.Label: 'NotificationFieldInfo' Fields (Rule notification information)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional 'NotificationFieldInfo' fields in the Device table

PropertyItem.Label: 'FixedLocationFieldInfo' Fields (for supporting non-movable assets)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional 'FixedLocationFieldInfo' fields in the Device table

PropertyItem.Label: 'LinkFieldInfo' (for supporting custom 'Device' links on the map)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional 'LinkFieldInfo' fields in the Device table

PropertyItem.Label: 'MaintOdometerFieldInfo' Fields (for supporting periodic maintenance reports)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional 'MaintOdometerFieldInfo' fields in the Device table

PropertyItem.Label: 'GeoCorridorFieldInfo' Fields (GeoCorridor support - requires Event Notification Rules Engine)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional 'GeoCorridorFieldInfo' fields in the Device table

PropertyItem.Label: 'DataPushInfo' Fields ("lastDataPushTime" and "lastEventCreateMillis")
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional 'DataPushInfo' fields in the Device table

PropertyItem.Description: Additional 'EventData' table fields:

PropertyItem.Label: 'AddressFieldInfo' Fields (additional address information)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional 'AddressFieldInfo' fields in the EventData table

PropertyItem.Label: 'GPSFieldInfo' Fields (additional GPS accuracy information)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional 'GPSFieldInfo' fields in the EventData table

PropertyItem.Label: 'CustomFieldInfo' Fields (miscellaneous fields)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional 'CustomFieldInfo' fields in the EventData table

PropertyItem.Label: 'ETAFieldInfo' Fields (Garmin ETA fields)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional 'ETAFieldInfo' fields in the EventData table

PropertyItem.Label: 'J1708FieldInfo' Fields (J1708/J1939/OBDII/CANBus information)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional 'J1708FieldInfo' fields in the EventData table

PropertyItem.Label: 'AtmosphereFieldInfo' Fields (Barometer, Ambient Temperature)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional Atmosphere fields in the EventData table

PropertyItem.Label: 'ThermoFieldInfo' Fields (Temperature information)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional Temperature fields in the EventData table

PropertyItem.Label: 'EndOfDaySummary' Fields (End-Of-Day summary fields)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional End-Of-Day summary fields in the EventData table

PropertyItem.Label: 'ServingCellTowerData' Fields (Serving Cell Tower data fields)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional Serving Cell Tower data fields in the EventData table

PropertyItem.Label: 'NeighborCellTowerData' Fields (Neighbor Cell Tower data fields)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional Neighbor Cell Tower data fields in the EventData table

PropertyItem.Description: Additional 'Geozone' table fields:

PropertyItem.Label: 'PriorityFieldInfo' Fields (support for overlapping Geozones)
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to include additional 'PriorityFieldInfo' fields in the Geozone table

PropertyItem.Description: Additional 'RuleList' table support (requires Event Notification Rules Engine):

PropertyItem.Label: Enable Rule lookup by 'DeviceGroup'
PropertyItem.ToolTip: Check this box to enable Rule lookup by DeviceGroup

GTSConfig.Completion:
The Configuration Process is Complete


Please press the "Save" button below to save your configuration changes.
(Changes are saved to the file "config.conf")

If any errors were detected, you will be given the oportunition to apply corrections.
You can then try again to save your configuration.
